page.title: 13Shopping Interviews.
page.content: The shop that we found was visited the most was Liptons.We found out that Liptons as well as being the most visited, was the most expensive. I think most people visit Liptons because it has more variety and the food may be better than that in the CO-OP. We have found that food shops are more popular than non food shops. Food shops are most used because we need food more than clothes or newspapers.Some people would like a laundrette, Amusements, Decor Shop, or a Fresh Fish Shop. I think people would like these because it would be useful to have them instead of having to go to town. People werent bothered if the shop opened earlier or later because they will have got used to the times. If they were at home all day they could go shopping when they wanted to.
